arts.ttl: Northern Ireland XI vs Slovakia – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Northern Ireland are set to challenge Slovakia on their turf in a vital World Cup qualifying match this Friday. Both teams are still firmly in the race for automatic qualification to the FIFA World Cup 2026, making this Group A clash at the Košická futbalová aréna in Košice a potentially pivotal game in their campaign. arts.ttl: Slovakia vs Northern Ireland predictions: Crunch clash in Kosice could be a cracker
arts.sum: Slovakia host Northern Ireland in World Cup qualifying Group A on Friday and James Milton expects the goals to flow in Kosice.
